alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:25PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...SLIPPERY TRAVEL ON THE RIDGES... Snow or a wintry mix will occur in some of the higher elevations of the Appalachians early this evening. Isolated locations in elevations above 2500 feet may receive 1 to 2 inches of snow accumulation, which could result in slippery travel and poor visibility. Precipitation will change to rain in most areas by mid evening. Be prepared for rapidly changing conditions if traveling across the ridges on Interstate 68 and Routes 33, 48, 50, and 250 this evening. Slow down and increase following distance.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pendleton; Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
